src:
49% apoiam impeachment de Trump

03 Nov 2019, 14:25

Segundo pesquisa do The Wall Street Journal e do canal NBC News, 49% dos americanos são favoráveis ao impeachment de Donald Trump, enquanto 46% se opõem.
Entre os democratas, a saída de Trump é apoiada por 88%. Já entre republicanos, 90% se opõem.
text:
49% support Trump impeachment

Nov 03, 2019, 14:25

According to a survey by The Wall Street Journal and NBC News, 49% of Americans are in favor of Donald Trump's impeachment, while 46% are opposed.
Among Democrats, Trump's exit is supported by 88%. Among Republicans, 90% are opposed.
